website_summaries.verdict: This is a very rugged model, ideal for serious beekeepers with many hives to service and process.
pros: Round veil provides wide line of sight
Manufacturer donates percentage to bee conservation organizations
cons: Fits very tightly around the hips

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, but NOT sting-proof. I have to wear thick jeans and a hooded sweatshirt to use this suit and not get stung. I made the mistake of not putting my hood on my sweatshirt up and got stung 6 or 7 times on the top of my head thru the veil. Keep looking and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Swimming in it, but cool(ish) and not stung,,,
customer_reviews.text: Got this size because I didn't want it tight across the chest(38DD) but this thing is huge! I will be ordering a medium when I can afford it. Couldn't return/exchange it as I had to use it the day it arrived. Too funny looking I'm sure! Wasn't stung once and my bees were very irritated with me. Gotta say it is hotter than Hades where I live and this suit didn't make me pass out. If this is as cool as it gets, I'll never order a different suit.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had some issues with some seams coming apart on my original suit that I bought. After leaving a review about how disappointed I was with my original suit, Humble Bee US contacted me and told me that they were going to send me a brand new suit and gloves. I was a little skeptical but thought I would see what happens. 3 days later a brand new fully ventilated suit and new pair of gloves and a extra veil showed up on my doorstep! Can't tell you how impressed I am with this company ensuring that their customers are happy and satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Grant williams

customer_reviews.title: Happy my big butt fits in the XXXL
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested this suit in the field but I did try it on and I LOVE IT. I was worried it wouldn't fit. I'm 5'5 240lb female so I have HUGE hips. I was worried my ass wouldn't fit in this so I ordered the largest available. Even though it fits me super long, I can say that my butt fit in this outfit and I'm thrilled. It appears to be very good quality, we'll see how it does once I put it to the test. My bees arrive mid April so I'll try to post an update!!
customer_reviews.author: Delia Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Have two other cheap jackets. This one is a heavy duty poplin type material, great feel to it. Veil is heavier material than the cheap versions available elsewhere. If you will be working with bees, you need to get this. I ordered up a size as heard that they run small. This one is a little large (normally wear xl, ordered 2xl, but not greatly so. Good closure around veil/neck with additional velcro closure flap over the zippers to make more secure. Comes in a nice canvas-type bag with zipper closure and carrying handles. Definitely worth the money. Very impressed with quality of this suit. Shipped quickly, came before expected.
customer_reviews.author: Primitive

customer_reviews.title: I will be watching this suit to see if it holds up better. The suit is nicely tailored (5'5"
customer_reviews.text: I used this suit for the first time today to install a new package of bees. Formerly I owned a more expensive ventilated suit, but the fabric degraded and tore at the seams. I will be watching this suit to see if it holds up better. The suit is nicely tailored (5'5", 170 lbs... Extra large fit well. Zippers are metal, and the elastic tabs at hands and feet keep the cuffs from rolling up when you put on gloves and boots. There are fewer ventilated panels, but the suit is lighter in weight. So far, so good. It would be nice if there was a tab at the label for easy hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thee was a small stain on the front of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Thee was a small stain on the front of the suit when I got it. I wasn't sure if it was from the zipper. Not worth spending the time or money to return it. I read all the reviews before purchasing. I ordered a size bigger, it was extra long in the legs and sleeves. I didn't use it yet, but when I tried it on I was amazes at how much cooler it was to wear than my other suit.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: My wife keeps bees. We live on a hill and I sometimes need to work around them. I have not been stung. I really like the suit, but the "veil" isn't up to par. It hits me in my face. And if it hits me in my face, well... a bee could, too. My wife bought one and agrees. She's since switched to a different veil.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I want to say that the customer service at Humble Bee is amazing. I had some holes in my hat and they are sending me a new one. I have also been very happy with the suit. It is well ventilated and overall pretty cool in the hot Missouri summers. It is well made. I would recommend wearing a baseball or other hat under it to keep the bees from stinging your head. Other than that, it has been a great suit.
customer_reviews.author: RS Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A must have gen your in pest control
customer_reviews.text: A must have for professionals. I use this in my business daily in the summer. Very good quality. Don’t waste your money on the cheap suits. I have bought cheaper suits and they tear easily and the zippers break. This is the best suit I’ve owned in 15 years in the business.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Ledyard

customer_reviews.title: comfort and safety
customer_reviews.text: The suit looks great and feels very well made. It breathes nicely and we did not get any stings when working in a queenless hive, which beekeepers know is a test of bravery. I'm 5'3" and about 200 lbs. The size LG fits me like a glove. The only criticism I can come up with is the veil has a tendency of touching my face- making a sting to the face possible if I'm not careful. The gloves were very comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dubs

customer_reviews.title: Even for a large the fit is too tight in ...
customer_reviews.text: Even for a large the fit is too tight in the hips. If you have curves this bee suit will be tight.
customer_reviews.author: black coffee

customer_reviews.title: the suit was the perfect gear. I could stand among the wasp without ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with wasp for many years. Now that I am old and can not move fast, the suit was the perfect gear. I could stand among the wasp without being stung.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Suit is pretty decent but the hat and veil are not great
customer_reviews.text: Veil is flimsy and when I turn my head or look down it folds and touches my nose, cheek or ear. I have another veil that is firm and stays well away from my skin preventing any bee stings if they did land on my face and want to do me harm (which fortunately they rarely do)
customer_reviews.author: Oxonthebox

customer_reviews.title: Functional and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: I love the upper body ventilation, and the leg zippers. I am much happier with the round hat and veil v fencing type. Good pocket placement and plenty of hook&loop where it's needed. Nice bag to pack it in too.
customer_reviews.author: gnosnhoj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, and fit is true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and fit. This is my third Humble Bee beekeeping suit purchase, and the quality for the price continues to be a leading reason I keep coming back. Love the venting in this bee suit!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made suit. The legs seem to run long, but we aren't in a fashion show. I am sure it will see many years of use. You can get stung through this suit, but as long as you get a size that is a little baggy, you should be fine. It is not paper thin like many cheaper suits.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Slish

customer_reviews.title: Good suit, but veil material cracked very early on.
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall suit, but the veil material appears to be just window screen material and it developed holes within a year. Elastic also became stretched out fairly quickly, which isn't that much of an issue, but bees inside your hood is! I wish I could get a hood with better veil material.
customer_reviews.author: RVW

customer_reviews.title: Great ventilation
customer_reviews.text: We love these suits the only downfall is the hat of the veil is very large and the netting touch’s the face or neck. I haven’t been stung but my husband has. I wear a bucket hat and it makes it snug and keeps the meeting away from my face. The suit part is perfect it breaths well and protects. As we made a split I had half the hive on my belly an legs.. not one sting!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: I treated a huge in ground yellow jacket nest and was not stung once. Suit gets a little warm being here in Florida but not nearly as bad as some other suits i have used.
customer_reviews.author: philip

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This suit is great. The only complaint I have is that the screened hat didn't stay on my head well. It has an elastic band to go around your head, but I added an elastic chin strap and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Hat brim too small
customer_reviews.text: Hat brim is too small. Bees always used to bite the back of my head until I covered the screen with duck tape. Humble bee does have a good warranty that they do stand behind, they replaced two veils for me.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Helpful but hot
customer_reviews.text: Lord have mercy dang near had a heat stroke in Alabama with the temperature at 83 degrees today. Didn’t get stung once though. It protects just super hot.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Little

customer_reviews.title: Great suit! Nicely ventilated and sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Great suit! Nicely ventilated and sturdy construction. Love the unbleached cotton bag it came in, and sizing was accurate. Great product, and cheaper price than at any of the main beekeeping supply companies. Thanks, HumbleBee! :-)
customer_reviews.author: eezzeebee

customer_reviews.title: Order a larger size than you need
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because for the size I feel it should be wider around the midparts but I’m loosing weight. It’s confortable and easy to use. The breathable mesh is great.
customer_reviews.author: Fna

customer_reviews.title: I am 6 foot 240, I got the XL ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 6 foot 240, I got the XL and it fits me perfectly, I think 1 size up is OK if you are a little bit bigger
customer_reviews.author: ChrisChicago

customer_reviews.title: Great ventilated suit
customer_reviews.text: The suit is great for ventilation, unfortunately it has come apart after about 10 times wearing the suit, it should be easily sewn. I had hoped that it would not have come apart so soon. I used this suit in 90-100 temps, I was still hot due to temps but not as hot as the person with a non-ventilated suit. He had to quit working because of the heat, where I would have been able to work for another hour.
customer_reviews.author: dolph

customer_reviews.title: ... owned a few different bee suits Humblebee is the best most comfortable yet and durable quality workmanship I am ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a few different bee suits Humblebee is the best most comfortable yet and durable quality workmanship I am thrilled to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: swamp witch

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and well made
customer_reviews.text: The padded knees, the hat is comfortable and does cover my eyes like its too big, the zippers all seal up so no bee can find its way inside the suit. It has tabs at the arm holes to hold onto while you pull on gloves, and on the legs to put under your foot to slide on shoes or socks. it has a vented material so you won't get as hot as solid canvas. I received it over the weekend and am excited to use it.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Good suit.
customer_reviews.text: Suit worked well. Go bigger on size. I'm 5'10", 215 lbs and the XXXL is a little snug. Used to clear out hive that fell out of tree in S. Az, so ventilation was much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: EricB

customer_reviews.title: Humble Bee 430-L Beekeeping Suit
customer_reviews.text: The suit size chart helped me select the correct suit for my frame. Shipment and delivery were prompt, and packaging was secure. I live in a warm climate; I think the ventilation of the suit will be sufficient. I really like the knee pad, and I think the sturdy fabric on the legs, torso, and arms will serve me well as I work around the hives.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Williams

customer_reviews.title: Have been stung 67% of the time wearing it.
customer_reviews.text: Today was the final straw with 14 stings. If I dont want to be stung, I have to wear long sleeves and jeans under the suit...can't do shorts and tee shirt lest I will be stung... I dont like it as I have allergic reactions to bee stings. ,,,sigghhh... have got to go back to the drawing board and research again.
customer_reviews.author: Bz

customer_reviews.title: Crotch is too high, atomic wedgie imminent
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, but as a 6'2 man with a long torso I had to opt for the XXL variant which is a bit loose and baggy. The smaller variants, L and XL both fit well except for the crotch region - disappointing. Humblebee, if you drop the XL size crotch by a couple of inches for extra room you'll improve the experience for others like me!
customer_reviews.author: William R. Hardin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The hat alone is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I am highly allergic to all insect bites, so the suit is perfect for gardening before the warm weather arrives, and then the hat is still wonderful in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: martha Harmon

customer_reviews.title: ... size to make sure I had room and it's perfect. I am over 6 foot tall and need ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a larger size to make sure I had room and it's perfect. I am over 6 foot tall and need plenty of distance from the head piece to the crotch zipper. The material and zippers look solid and I believe I can use this for years.
customer_reviews.author: Philip B Graham

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bee suit - no stings and very comfortable/cool.
customer_reviews.author: MoLoMaui

customer_reviews.title: Great protection from wasps for those times when you have to wasp-hunt!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this suit. Use it for those times when we need protection from large red wasps that build in our eaves and whose nests must be systematically destroyed. A must for wasp hunters!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality suit
customer_reviews.text: Great quality suit. I am a first time bee keeper. It's quality sticking and there are no holes. The head part stays on your head well.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Klimek

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Quality fabric, zippers and construction. Correct sizing-5'2" female fit Small perfectly with a bit of room. Very happy with purchase. Angry bees can still sting thru the cotton fabric-but the mesh portion of the suit definitely keeps you cooler than other suits I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suit. Seals nice with quality zippers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome suit. Seals nice with quality zippers. I would order a size larger than you need. I got a few stings under my arm doing a cut out because it's tight when I raise my arms.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Bzzzzzzzz...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made bee suit that also comes in a zip up square pouch! No way anyone is getting stung through this suit!
customer_reviews.author: KatBug

customer_reviews.title: This fits great and is easy to get in to
customer_reviews.text: So far, no stings! This fits great and is easy to get in to. It's not as loose (baggy) as I would hoped for an XXXL but I'm 6'2", 245 lbs with a 46" chest. I would have preferred one more size up but this is as big as I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Jelewis

customer_reviews.title: Humble Bee full suit
customer_reviews.text: The suit is made nicely with quality materials including the zipper. The ventilated areas are great and it has full ventilation hat. The Washing will tell how good it is, I haven't washed it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality suit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bigger guy (6 ft. 270 lbs) and the suit fits great. No stings yet and feel very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kerechanin

customer_reviews.title: Best bee suit I haven't seen
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Coolest most ruggedly built suit I have ever seen. Defiantly order larger than you think they run small
customer_reviews.author: K. Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been keeping bees for 5 years now and have been through 3 suits trying to find something I liked. This is it
customer_reviews.text: Oh my word! I’ve been keeping bees for 5 years now and have been through 3 suits trying to find something I liked. This is it! Ventilated and fit great! Stayed cool and the bigger fit gave me room to move! I was the envy of the bee yard. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I AM INVINSIBLE!! To tics, chiggers, wasps, mosquitos, ect.... Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Closeout

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The suits that we ordered were supposed to be extra large and they are way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Sulusix

customer_reviews.title: Must have breathable suit!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, I weigh 170 lbs. and picked an XLG. Was the right call. Really nice vision from the hood and easy to put on. Getting one for my wife to update hers
customer_reviews.author: David Dammann

customer_reviews.title: My husband was very happy with the Beekeeping Suit
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very happy with the Beekeeping Suit. It came a day late, but it was still in plenty of time. And we take into consideration where things are being shipped from and the weather at this time. Thank you so much. 5 stars from us! Jerry and Cavan Rose (we'll be back if we have any other needs.)
customer_reviews.author: Cavan Rose

customer_reviews.title: I got stung!!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore this Suit, I was stung 5 times. Once on the face and four times on the back of my neck. The veil collapses back toward my face. I'm now back to my old jacket.
customer_reviews.author: William Lord

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my Humble Bee purchase. Looking forward to using it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R.

customer_reviews.title: Worn Out in one Wearing
customer_reviews.text: After ONE wearing the wire poked through the hem of the veil making the suit dangerous to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic outfit, well made with exceptional zipper quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic outfit, well made with exceptional zipper quality. I thought I would get stung through the mesh at first but it hasn't happened yet, even after installing some new hives. Perfect suit for the summer. Excellent peripheral vision too!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great suit so far
customer_reviews.text: Great suit so far, went with a size larger than I needed, glad I did, perfect with a little extra room. Zipper veil has great visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Norris

customer_reviews.title: The brass zipper is perfect. Customer service is the reason I like the ...
customer_reviews.text: If there were a sixth star this company has earned it. The suit is well made and designed. The brass zipper is perfect. Customer service is the reason I like the company. They are an awesome group.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This suit fit perfectly. The veil is easy to see through too
customer_reviews.author: Kristen's mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We're new to beekeeping and are delighted with the quality of the 2 suits we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: rustyplow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent construction and finishing
customer_reviews.text: This suit was for my wife and it fit perfectly based on the sizing charts provided. Excellent construction and finishing. Thanks for the quality work. Aloha
customer_reviews.author: Vincent P. Ponthieux

customer_reviews.title: Your average size may not fit there average size bee suit
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way the suit was designed.Lots of ventilation very well padded in all the right places.I do have one coment about the zipper, I would wish that it was somewhat more of a heavy duty zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Mac G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BEST BEE SUIT!!!!!! I've tried several and this one is not as hot and not one sting!!
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBee Mom

customer_reviews.title: The hood is just great! Also
customer_reviews.text: The hood is just great! Also, it is pretty simple to sip up once you know the ropes. Pockets are great, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jillin J. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for my son who is taking up bee ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my son who is taking up bee keeping / assisting a neighbor with his hives. Looks to be well made as well something that he'll be able to grow a little with.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Welchons

customer_reviews.title: Great Bee Suit
customer_reviews.text: Gives me all the confidence I need to work with my bees!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: A quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This garment fits well and provides solid protection from honeybee stings.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey G.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Love this bee suit.....fits great and does what I need it to do, which is keep me from getting stung
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive at first to buy this on-line without seeing it but the quality is great and it fits as described.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! I'm a new beekeeper and bought this because ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! I'm a new beekeeper and bought this because I have one "mean" hive and my jacket/hood combo was not enough. This one is terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Darci M

customer_reviews.title: Other than that - great!
customer_reviews.text: Zippers stiff and hard t manipulate. Other than that - great!
customer_reviews.author: Clarke F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly - easy to get on and off. Would absolutely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: The suit was 3 sizes to big, but had to use it to collect swarm of bees. Didn't get stung. Good thing
customer_reviews.author: Laurie M. Love

customer_reviews.title: I bought this suit for my husband, he is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suit for my husband, he is a beginner Beekeeper. He loves it, not hot to work in and feels very secure.
customer_reviews.author: amy weaver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This a good quality item, with ventilation netting. This item is worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great gear
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10" and 195lbs. The XXL gives me a nice roomy fit without excess bulk. I am also impressed with the overall quality of the materials and the heavy duty brass zippers and the closure. The big game changer is the ventilation. The mesh vent panels make the suit much more comfortable whether you are protecting yourself from the sun or the bees. I'm very happy with this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Large for 5'10" fits well, better quality than Natural Apiary suit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and the Natural Apiary brand suit for my husband and the quality of this one is much better. Thicker material and smoother zipper. The ventilation is also nice. Husband is 5'10" and the L fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Dangerboots

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the recommended size.
customer_reviews.text: Only put on twice. Wish it had more distance between shoulders and crotch. I ordered the recommended size.
customer_reviews.author: TOM GATES

customer_reviews.title: looks like will be perfect
customer_reviews.text: Well built,have not used yet but built with quality material.looks like will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Lovejoy

product_meta.title: Humble Bee 430 Ventilated Beekeeping Suit with Round Veil
product_meta.description: Size:Large| Color:Linen WhiteHumble Bee was founded in 2014 by us, Ahmed and Michal, while we were living in the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg. We got started in apiculture and learned how to raise our own beehives by attending classes organized through our local beekeeping association. With each passing season, though, we noticed there were fewer and fewer wild bees around and more and more beehives collapsing without any obvious cause. After suffering the loss of our own hives, we decided it was time to take action and help save the bees. That's why we established Humble Bee and agreed on a mission - to give back 10% of our profits to charities that encourage local beekeeping activities and promote bee conservation efforts. We want to get more people involved with beekeeping and help newcomers establish their own apiaries. Our beekeeping products are built to the highest safety and quality standards. In fact, we only sell products that we've tested and use at our own apiaries! We promise that you'll love your new Humble Bee gear as much as we do, or we'll give you a full refund - no questions asked. And, to top things off, we the caliber of all our products with a hassle-free 2-year .
feature_bullets: Ventilated beekeeper suit with self-supporting round veil, heavy duty brass zippers, durable double-stitched pockets, cushioned kneepads, and deluxe canvas carrying case

Medium-weight 50% cotton / 50% synthetic blend (280 gsm) cloth provides outstanding protection against bee stings, while ultra-breathable 100% synthetic (220 gsm) ventilation panels keep you cool in hot weather conditions
Tailored fit with an elastic waist, elastic wrists, and elastic ankles, plus thumb and foot holds to keep everything comfortably in place
Unisex design for men and women between 5'9" - 5'10" (174 - 179 cm), with removable veil for easy cleaning and storage
Humble Bee donates 10% of earnings to not-for-profit organizations that encourage local beekeeping activities and promote bee conservation efforts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars161 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
